casebody.data:
Susan Ruth RIGGS, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
TRINITY HEALTH-MICHIGAN/SAINT MARY'S HOSPITAL, Adam Michael Anderson, M.D., Jennifer Lynell Macek, PA-C, Sparta Health Center Mercy Health, Sparta Family Health Center, Mercy Health Physician Partners, John Henry Schneider, Jr., M.D., and Grand River Emergency Medical Group PLC, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 156824
COA: 334641 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 19, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
